channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Guatemala says it suggested that U.S. send its unaccompanied migrant children home
item.description: As a U.S. federal judge blocked the deportation of unaccompanied Guatemalan children, the government of Guatemala says in a statement it suggested the...

item.title: Trump Crime Strategy May Work for Now, but Not for Long, Experts Say
item.description: The president is looking to add troops to city streets while cutting funds for programs that work, experts and local officials say. But one idea, beau...

item.title: U.S. Suspends Visas for Palestinian Passport Holders, Officials Say
item.description: The move will stop, at least temporarily, travel for medical treatment, attending university, visiting relatives or conducting business.

item.title: Rudy Giuliani Is Hurt in Car Crash in New Hampshire
item.description: Mr. Giuliani, the former New York City mayor and lawyer for President Trump, suffered a fractured vertebra, his head of security said.

item.title: Already Pardoned by Trump, Jan. 6 Rioters Push for Compensation
item.description: One of the rioters’ lawyers wants to create a panel that would decide on financial damages for what the rioters believe were unfair prosecutions.

item.title: Robert Mueller Has Parkinson’s Disease, Family Says

item.title: Hundreds of unaccompanied Guatemalan children can stay in the U.S. for now, judge says
item.description: A federal district judge issued a temporary restraining order after the U.S. attempted to deport hundreds of unaccompanied Guatemalan children without...

item.title: Brazil Tightens Bolsonaro House Arrest Amid Escape Concerns
item.description: Former President Jair Bolsonaro, who will stand trial on Tuesday, is being closely monitored by the Brazilian authorities, who fear he may try to flee...

item.title: Behind Thai Premier’s Dismissal, Unraveling of an Uneasy Alliance

item.title: U.S. Suspends Visas for Palestinian Passport Holders, Officials Say
item.description: The move will stop, at least temporarily, travel for medical treatment, attending university, visiting relatives or conducting business.

item.title: Chicago's mayor pushes back as Trump administration readies immigration crackdown
item.description: Brandon Johnson signed an executive order barring the city's police from collaborating with federal officers on civil immigration enforcement operatio...

item.title: Friday night football brings healing in Kerrville
item.description: Still recovering from devastating July flash flooding, the Kerrville community gathered for the Texas tradition of high school football Friday night. ...

item.title: Rudy Giuliani hospitalized with broken vertebra after car accident, spokesperson says
item.description: Former New York City Mayor Rudy Giuliani has been hospitalized with a broken vertebra after a car accident in New Hampshire, according to his spokespe...

item.title: China Shows Off Its Power
item.description: Xi Jinping is using a summit with leaders like Narendra Modi and Vladimir Putin as an opportunity to pull countries away from the U.S.

item.title: Judge Halts U.S. Effort to Deport Guatemalan Children as Planes Sit on Tarmac
item.description: The temporary block ended another last-minute flurry of legal action over the Trump administration’s immigration crackdown.
